intro: Dovyalis mollis, commonly known as the sour plum or Natal plum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to southern Africa and is characterized by its small, yellowish-green fruits that are typically sour in taste. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are usually ovate or elliptic in shape. It produces small, white to pink flowers that bloom in clusters. Dovyalis mollis is often found in shrubland and coastal areas, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
